snippet: Conceding to political reality, President Obama, who once said the flow of money to political action committees threatened democracy, attended a Senate Majority PAC event.

byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR and JULIE HIRSCHFELD DAVIS

lead_paragraph: Conceding to political reality, President Obama, who once said the flow of money to political action committees threatened democracy, attended a Senate Majority PAC event.

headline.main: Obama, in a First, Attends a ‘Super PAC’ Fund-Raiser
